// Fixed header and sidebar at scrolling.
$('body').addClass('fixed');

# Logos.
    tags$div(
      tags$p("Projekt:"),
      tags$img(src = "logo/Industrie_4.0_Werkstatt.png", style = "height: 40px; margin-bottom: 5px;"),
      tags$p("Projektleitung:"),
      # Width of sidebar: 230px.
      tags$img(src = "logo/TCG.jpg", style = "height: 40px; margin-bottom: 5px;"),
      tags$img(src = "logo/THD.jpg", style = "height: 40px; margin-bottom: 5px;"),
      tags$p("Gefördert durch:"),
      tags$img(src = "logo/EFRE.jpg", style = "height: 40px; margin-bottom: 5px;"),
      tags$p("Version: 1.0"),
      
      style = "margin-left: 10px; position: absolute; bottom: 0;"
    )

# Logos.
    tags$li(
      tags$div(
        tags$p("Projekt:"), 
        style = "color: white; margin: 15px"), 
      class = "dropdown"
    ),
    
    tags$li(
      tags$div(
        tags$img(src = "logo/Industrie_4.0_Werkstatt.jpg", style = "height: 40px"),
        style = "margin: 5px"
      ),
      class = "dropdown"
    ),
    
    tags$li(
      tags$div(
        tags$p("Projektleitung:"),
        style = "color: white;margin: 15px"
      ),
      class = "dropdown"
    ),
    
    tags$li(
      tags$div(
        tags$img(src = "logo/TCG.jpg", style = "height: 40px"),
        tags$img(src = "logo/THD.jpg", style = "height: 40px"),
        style = "margin: 5px"
      ),
      class = "dropdown"
    ),
    
    tags$li(
      tags$div(
        tags$p("Gefördert durch:"),
        style = "color: white;margin: 15px"
      ),
      class = "dropdown"
    ),
    
    tags$li(
      tags$div(
        tags$img(src = "logo/EFRE.jpg", style = "height: 40px;"),
        style = "margin: 5px"
      ),
      class = "dropdown"
    ),
    
    tags$li(
      tags$div(
        tags$p("Version: 1.2"),
        style = "color: white;margin: 15px"
      ),
      class = "dropdown"
    )
